|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = 4.4/4.2/3.6/3.2 |windriv = |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 10GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |is_manuf = No |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = 10GbE (10GBase-T) |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 06/15/2017 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833320272 |asin = B072N84DG6 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = none |connactled = red (activity) |spdledcolor = green (10G), yellow (5G) |leddupcolor = none |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1244-00001444-01Z" and "1703" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Aquantia|Edimax}} ===Specifications=== *Interface: 1x RJ-45 port, 1x PCIe 3.0 x4 (single-line) *Data Connection Rate: 100Mbps/1Gbps/2.5Gbps/5Gbps/10Gbps *Standard Compliance: 802.3u/802.3ab/802.3an/802.3az/802.1p :802.3u 100Base-TX, 802.3ab 1000Base-T, 802.3an 10GBase-T :802.3az Energy Efficient Ethernet, 802.1p Priority Queuing (QoS) *LED Indicator: Speed LED / Link/Act LED :Speed LED: Dual color, Link/Act LED: Single color (Flashing) *Jumbo Frame: up to 9 KB; built-in QoS ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8319/asus-xg-c100c-10gbe-pcie-network-adapter-review/index.html ''ASUS XG-C100C 10Gbe PCIe Network Adapter'' on '''TweakTown'''] :Chip: [[Aquantia]] AQC107-B0-C, OUI: 88:D7:F6 ([https://www.tweaktown.com/image.php?image=imagescdn.tweaktown.com/content/8/3/8319_05_asus-xg-c100c-10gbe-pcie-network-adapter-review_full.jpg PCB images]) *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-xg-c100c-review ''ASUS XG-C100C'' Review on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===News=== *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/asus-xg-c100c-10gbase-t-nic,34844.html ''ASUS Releases XG-C100C 10GBASE-T NIC'' on '''TomsHardWare'''] *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/11598/asus-launches-xgc100c-10-gbe-adapter-aquantia-aqc107-99 ''ASUS XG-C100C 10G Adapter: Aquantia AQC107'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/10908/aquantia-launches-new-2g-5g-multi-gigabit-network-controllers-for-pcs ''Aquantia AQC107'' on '''AnandTech'''] ([http://images.anandtech.com/doci/10908/aq2.jpg PCB image]) :AQC107: 100Mb/1GbE/2.5GbE/5GbE/10GbE (10GBase-T) :AQC108: 100Mb/1GbE/2.5GbE/5GbE (11x7 mm) ===Drivers=== *[https://cateee.net/lkddb/web-lkddb/NET_VENDOR_AQUANTIA.html Ethernet Network Cards that uses the aQuantia AQC107/AQC108 chipset]

==See also== *[[ASUS ROG Areion 10G]] - ''10GBase-T PCIe LAN Card'' ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [https://rog.asus.com/articles/networking/bring-10gbit-ethernet-home/ PR] *ASUS XG-C100C - ''10GBase-T PCIe Network Adapter'' ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-C100C/ PPage] *[[ASUS XG-C100F]] - ''10G SFP+ PCIe 3.0 4x Network Adapter'' (SFP+/DAC) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-C100F/ PPage] *[[ASUS XG-U2008]] - ''10GBase-T Network 10-Port Unmanaged Switch'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-U2008 PPage] *[[ASUS PEB-10G]] (57840-2S) - ''10G SFP+ PCIe Network Adapter'' (BCM57840S) • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA98C8K92999 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC68]] - ''AC1900 Dual Band WiFi PCIe Adapter'' (3x3, BCM4360) • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA25V6K14597 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC58BT]] - ''AC2100 Dual Band 160MHz WiFi PCIe Adapter'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/PCE-AC58BT/ PPage] *[[ASUS PCE-AC56]] - ''AC1300 Dual Band WiFi PCIe Adapter'' (2x2, BCM4352)• [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIAGUK7X95520 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC55BT B1]] - ''AC1200 Dual Band WiFi/BT4.2 PCIe Adapter'' • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA1K664V3936 NE] *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC107]] - 5/10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [http://www.anandtech.com/show/11024/gigabyte-exhibits-an-aquantia-aqc107-based-10g-ethernet-pcie-card PR] *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC108]] - 2.5/5GbE PCI-Express LAN Card ([[Aquantia]] AQC108 [[Category:English Documentation]]
